sentences.sContent: He asked for immediate help from the United States to dismantle the warheads.
sentences.sCn: 他向美国请求即时援助，拆除弹头。

synos.tran: 拆除；取消；解散；除掉…的覆盖物

remMethod.val: dis(去掉) + mantle(覆盖) → 去掉覆盖 → 拆除

words.tran: 拆卸；拆除的行动或状态

trans.tranCn: 拆除； 废除， 取消
trans.tranOther: If you dismantle a machine or structure, you carefully separate it into its different parts
